Uses of Interface
com.i2group.apollo.client.IClientFactory

Packages that use IClientFactory
com.i2group.apollo.client Contains interfaces and a class for interacting with the Intelligence Analysis Platform through the supplied Java client. 
com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.loader Contains interfaces and implementing classes for creating and managing items from an external data source in the Analysis Repository or an ELP stage. 
 

Uses of IClientFactory in com.i2group.apollo.client
 

Methods in com.i2group.apollo.client that return IClientFactory
static IClientFactory ClientFactoryFactory.createClientFactory(String url, Iterable<? extends IClientHandler> connectionHandlers)
          Creates and returns an IClientFactory for the Intelligence Analysis Platform deployment at the specified URL, using the specified IClientHandlers.
static IClientFactory ClientFactoryFactory.createClientFactory(String url, String username, String password)
          Creates and returns an IClientFactory for the Intelligence Analysis Platform deployment at the specified URL, with the specified user name and password.
 

Uses of IClientFactory in com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.loader
 

Methods in com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.loader that return IClientFactory
 IClientFactory IClientConnectionBuilder.build(String servicesURL, String userName, String password)
          Creates and returns an IClientFactory for generating clients that use the specified URL, user name, and password.
